name: The Golden Knight
description:
The Golden Knight is a metroidvania game made by Mathantastic Productions, and this is the first released version of the game, it is still very early in the development, but it already has the first half an hour of the gameplay done, I posted this so that my youtube viewers can give me feedback on the game

Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCyFh4z_TxzxhQtzkIKssWIw
